title: Subpart 8186-9 - Adjusted Base Proportions For Special Assessing Units
content:
Subpart 8186-9 - Adjusted Base Proportions For Special Assessing Units

State Regulations
§ 8186-9.3 - Computation of base percentages, current percentages, and current base proportions
§ 8186-9.4 - Certification of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions
§ 8186-9.5 - Determination of adjusted base proportions
§ 8186-9.6 - Certification of adjusted base proportions
§ 8186-9.8 - Special procedures for a new portion or portion class

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
